text: Youths Nidal Sanduqah and Ra' fat al - Bajjali were seriously injured as result of a strong explosion that rocked the center of Bethlehem . Our correspondent said that causes of the explosion , which took place in a house in Al - Saf Street in the city , are still unknown . He added that a third person was moderately wounded in the explosion . The concerned agencies have launched an investigation into the incident .
